## v4.0.0-alpha.46 (2024-09-18)

#### :house: Internal

* Made `addTTL` functionality lazy

## v3.47.0 (2021-05-17)

#### :bug: Bug Fix

* Fixed bugs when take a place mutations caused by side effects

## v3.40.0 (2021-04-01)

#### :rocket: New Feature

* Added a wrapper to provide the feature of cache expiring
